text: Yara pichane raye gela [1] tara allah‌ra rasulera birud'dhacarana [2] kare base thakate'i ananda bodha karala ebam tadera dhana-sampada o jibana dbara allah‌ra pathe jihada kara apachanda karala ebam tara balala, ‘garamera madhye abhiyane bera hayo na.‘Baluna, ‘uttape jahannamera aguna pracandatama [3]’, yadi tara bujhata
